meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Tim Kresowik Heather Timberlake Christopher Short Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6126.

td.p: Tim Kresowik, a urology resident from Iowa City, Iowa
Heather Timberlake, a new mom from Miami, Florida
Christopher Short, a pub trivia editor from Crawfordsville, Indiana (whose 6-day cash winnings total $94,752)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Cologne, Germany')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_2_1', 'clue_J_2_1_stuck', 'It\'s the maiden name of the gal Homer married in Shotgun Pete\'s wedding chapel & of the gal JFK married in Newport')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: It's the maiden name of the gal Homer married in Shotgun Pete's wedding chapel & of the gal JFK married in Newport

tr.td: (Jimmy of the Clue Crew shows a map of Egypt on the monitor.) Egypt originally hugged the Nile River, but over the next 1,200 years, it gradually grew to cover an area reaching as far north as this river by the 1400s B.C.

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '
HeatherWhat is Domenican? Repub
$4,000
ChristopherWhat is the Dominican Republic?
$2,000
TimWhat is the Dominican Republic?
$5,801
the Dominican Republic')
